current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: Recognizing the month of October 2013 as

cosponsor.#tail: ) submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

text.#text:
recognizes the
			 month of October 2013 as

honors the
			 contribution of principals in the elementary schools, middle schools, and high
			 schools of the United States by supporting the goals and ideals of National
			 Principals Month.

Whereas the National Association of Secondary School
			 Principals and the National Association of Elementary School Principals have
			 declared the month of October 2013 to be

Whereas principals are educational visionaries,
			 instructional and assessment leaders, disciplinarians, community builders,
			 budget analysts, facilities managers, and administrators of legal and
			 contractual obligations;

Whereas the vision, actions, and dedication of principals
			 provide the mobilizing force behind any school reform effort; and

Whereas the celebration of National Principals Month would
			 honor elementary school, middle school, and high school principals, and
			 recognize the importance of principals in ensuring that every child has access
			 to a high-quality education: Now, therefore, be it

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SRES 260 ATS: Recognizing the month of October 2013 as “National Principals Month”.
